content.rendered:
Western Way

Strategic Housing Development

Western Way SHD Application

Retention of the Hendrons Building as part of an overall redevelopment of the site to accommodate a build-to-rent shared living scheme and publicly accessible neighbourhood uses (including café/shop, gym and yoga studios). The scheme will include 280 no. shared living rooms (281. no bedspaces), internal and external amenity space, secure bicycle parking, site-wide landscaping, ESB substation and switch-room and site development works all on the 0.3285 hectare site.
